text:
Jessica Alba Biography

There are a lot of most beautiful women we have in Hollywood but there are very few of them who are a beauty with brains. They have been proving time and again that beauty comes with wits as well. We have this amazingly beautiful actress who is a very intelligent businesswoman as well. We are talking about Jessica Alba. She has been entertaining us with the best in her capabilities all this while.





Jessica Alba Early Life Specifies | Biography | Family Background | Academy Specifics













Jessica Alba was born on April 28th in the year 1981 Pomona, California. Jessica Alba mother Catherine Louisa had Danish, Welsh, German, English, and French ancestry, while her father Mark David Alba had a Mexican ancestry. Jessica Alba also has a younger brother named as Joshua. Jessica Alba father was working in Air Force and his career took his family to Biloxi in Mississippi and Del Rio in Texas. After that, they got shifted to Claremont in California when Jessica Alba was just years old. Once Jessica Alba stated that "her family is very conservative family – a traditional, Catholic, Latin American family" and Jessica Alba was just opposite and liberal. Jessica Alba was a feminist. As a child, she faced too many medical disorders. When Jessica Alba a little girl she suffered from partially collapsed lungs twice and from pneumonia four to five times a year, a ruptured appendix and a tonsillar cyst as well. Jessica Alba also had asthma in her childhood and suffered from the obsessive compulsive disorder. Jessica Alba graduated from Claremont High School when Jessica Alba was 16 years old and after that, she joined a theater group.





Jessica Alba Career Specific | Acting Carrer | First Appearance | Golden Globe Nomination

















Jessica Alba once said that she had an interest in acting since she was just 5 years old. When Jessica Alba was 11 years old she made her mother agree to take her to an acting competition in Beverly Hills in which the grand prize was the free acting classes. Jessica Alba won that competition and after nine months an agent signed her. Her first appearance was in a film with a short role named Camp Nowhere which was released in 1994. Jessica Alba also tried her luck in TV commercials and appeared in 2 of them namely Nintendo and J.C. Penny. After that, Jessica Alba was started and cast for various independent films. Jessica Alba also appeared for three episodes on Nickelodeon TV series named The Secret World of Alex Mack. Jessica Alba did the role of Maya in two seasons of TV series named Flipper. In 1998, Jessica Alba appeared as Melissa Hauer in a first-season episode of the Steven Bochco crime-drama Brooklyn South, as Leanne in two episodes of Beverly Hills, 90210, and as Layla in an episode of The Love Boat: The Next Wave. In 1999 Jessica Alba appeared in a comedy show named P.U.N.K.S. when Jessica Alba completes her high school and got graduated Jessica Alba learned acting with William H Macy and his wife at Atlantic Theatre company. Jessica Alba gained recognition in 1999 with appearing in a romantic comedy named Never Been Kissed.

















One day Jessica Alba went to audition for the James Cameron TV series Dark Angel and Jessica Alba was chosen by him from the pool of over 1,200 candidates. The series was run for two years and it was getting good critical reviews which earned it a Golden Globe nomination. Jessica Alba received the Teen Choice Award for Choice Actress and Saturn Award for Best Actress for her role in Dark Angel. In 2006, Alba received an MTV Movie Award for Sexiest Performance for Sin City. Jessica Alba also drew attention for some bad criticism as well and she was also nominated for Razzie Award for Worst Actress for appearing in Fantastic Four and Into the Blue. Jessica Alba was nominated for the same award for 2007's Awake, Good Luck Chuck, and Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer. In some of her movies Jessica Alba acted doing the role of an aspiring dance like in Honey, an exotic dancer in Sin City, The Invisible Woman, Fantastic Four and in its sequel too.









Jessica Alba MTV Movies Awards | International Film Festival | Razzie Awards









Jessica Alba had also been seen hosting the 2006 MTV Movie Awards and performed sketches spoofing the movies King Kong, Mission: Impossible 3, and Da Vinci Code. In 2008 Jessica Alba tried making some differences in her career and starting with, Jessica Alba appeared in a horror film named The Eye which was a remake of the Hong Kong’s original version. The movie gathered mixed reviews and Jessica Alba received the Teen Choice Award for her role in the movie and the nomination for the worst actress in Razzie awards as well. Later that year Jessica Alba got featured in The Love Guru along with Justin Timberlake and Mike Meyers and that movie was a total flop. Jessica Alba was signed for a movie named An Invisible Sign of My Own in 2008 and that movie finished filming in November 2008 and premiered at Hamptons International Film Festival but released in 2011.

















Her 2010 started with being starred in five films in a row which were The Killer Inside me doing a role of a prostitute, Valentine’s Day which was a romantic comedy and was huge hit playing Ashton Kutcher’s girlfriend with Julia Roberts, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Biel, Bradley Cooper, and Jennifer Garner as her co-cast. Later in the year, she appeared in the movie named Machete, An Invisible Sign of my Own and in Life Fockers. In 2011, Alba appeared in the film Spy Kids: All the Time in the World. In the year 2012 in the month of January, Jessica Alba announced big news that she was launching a new range of body care products which are toxic free, partnering with Chris Gavigan and they named the company as The Honest Company. The current value of the company I estimated to be approx US$1 billion. In March 2012, Jessica Alba announced that she will be releasing a book, The Honest Life, based on her experiences creating a natural, non-toxic life for her family. The book was published in early 2013 by Rodale. In 2013 Jessica Alba was seen in a comedy movie named A.C.O.D and an animated film named Escape from Planet Earth. Jessica Alba was also seen reprising her role of Santana in Machete's sequel named Machete Kills and Nancy Callahan in Sin City: A Dame to Kill For, the sequel to 2005's Sin City. The movie finished filming in 2012 while it was released in 2014.









Jessica Alba Most Beautiful Actress | 5th Sexiest Femail Star | Relationship | Most Attractive Woman

















In 2012 Jessica Alba was ranked as No. 1 on Maxim Magazine’s Hot 100 list of celebrities. In 2005 Jessica Alba got her spot on the People’s list of 50 most beautiful people. Jessica Alba stated that "I have to go to certain lengths to use sexuality to my advantage while guiding people to thinking the way I want them to." Jessica Alba also made it to the list of 100 most beautiful ladies section of People’s Magazine in the year 2007. In 2002, Jessica Alba was voted as the 5th Sexiest Female Star for 2002 in a Hollywood. The poll, No.4 in the Top 10 Sci-Fi Babes, No.6 in FHM's Sexiest Girls for their poll, and ranked at No.12 in Stuff magazine's "102 Sexiest Women in the World" 2002 edition. Jessica Alba also appeared on the cover of Playboy Magazine in 2006 among the list of top 25 sexiest celebs and also named as the Sex Star of The Year. Jessica Alba took a legal action against Playboy to use her image for their promotion without her consent for which she said that it was her nude pictorial. However, Jessica Alba later dropped the lawsuit after receiving a personal apology from Playboy owner Hugh Hefner, who agreed to make donations to two charities that Alba has supported.

















There was a news once that one Chinese girl was planning to get a plastic surgery done to get her appearance just like that of Jessica Alba to win her boyfriend back, it was then when Jessica Alba said that nobody should ever change one’s appearance for love. In 2006 Jessica Alba was ranked at No. 3 in a poll of E! Television’s list of celebrities with sexiest bodies. In 2006 readers of AskMen.com voted Alba No. 1 on 99 Most Desirable Women, while in 2007, Maxim Magazine placed Alba on the number 2 spot of their Top 100. Both GQ and In Style had Jessica Alba on their June 2008 covers and in May, after eight million votes, FHM named Alba the winner as 2007's Sexiest Woman in the World. She has also been regarded as one of the world’s most attractive woman with again booking her the 8th spot on Maxim’s Hot 100 list of an attractive woman. She was also named as one of the 100 Hottest Women of All-Time by Men's Health. People named her one of 2012 Most Beautiful at Every.
